name: ad-auris-iframe-distribution
description: script to conside with Ad-Auris's audio widget distribution

scripts.minify: echo "Minifiying: script-non-minfied.js to script.js" && uglifyjs script-non-minified.js --output script.js
scripts.minify-preload: echo "Minifiying: preloaded-non-minified-script.js to preload-script.js" && uglifyjs preloaded-non-minified-script.js --output preload-script.js
scripts.minify-canonical: echo "Minifiying: canonical-url-non-minified-script.js to canonical-url-script.js" && uglifyjs canonical-url-non-minified-script.js --output canonical-url-script.js
scripts.minify-newspack: echo "Minifiying: newspack-script-non-minfied.js to newspack-script.js" && uglifyjs newspack-script-non-minified.js --output newspack-script.js

author: Nick Kao
